Hope everyone is enjoying the holidays, I am trying to do a little holiday cleanup here and have a few items I am looking to part ways with.  All are  pretty nice cards that would make great gifts or additions to someones collection.  :)

 All prices include delivery and I prefer paypal with no fees (Gift/Payment Owed).  Email (rdamboise4@gmail.com) or PM me if interested.

Hello,

Since your name is Tolstoi, I thought I would ask if you know of or have available a Luther "Dummy" Taylor card with a Tolstoi back?

Thanks,

Scott.
[url]scottg@accessmfgsys.com[/url]

I don't have any Taylor's, let alone a Tolstoi one, but if I find one with a Tolstoi back I will keep you in mind.

Thanks for asking :)
reduced prices again and added three.
